snippet: The show jumper Phedras de Blondel was led from his stall and killed. When he was found, his legs and much of his shoulders had been removed.
abstract: Grand Prix-level show jumper horse Phedras de Blondel is discovered killed and carved up outside his stall in Palmetto, Fla, in which appears to be work of professional butcher; incident is latest in series of crimes across state involving slaughter of stolen livestock for meat.
lead_paragraph: The show jumper Phedras de Blondel was led from his stall and killed. When he was found, his legs and much of his shoulders had been removed.

headline.print_headline: Stolen Show Horse Is Found Butchered in Florida
headline.main: Florida Show Horse Is Stolen and Slaughtered, Apparently for Meat
